name: Slum musketeer
description:
Slum musketeer: Tells the story of a student whose teacher was kidnapped by an evil prince. For many years, the teacher did not want to give documents on his land, and then one ordinary day he was kidnapped! The student and his associates will have to do everything to return the teacher and his land. Overcome various traps, fight enemies with swords, and also destroy bosses!

The game is a 2D platformer with puzzle elements. Go through many levels, find out what happened to the teacher. Find a way to bring it back!

Game Features:
-Mature Content
-Nice graphics
-Interesting battles
-Good soundtrack
